meta.core_mechanic: Left-click to reveal a cell and right-click to flag suspected mines; reveal all safe cells without detonating a mine to win. The game is deterministic when seeded; mines are placed at initialization using a fixed RNG seed for replayability.

rules.text: Clear, testable rule with input/output MUST specify error codes for illegal actions.
AI MUST make a move within 2 seconds of its turn starting.
AI with difficulty 'easy' MUST use [simple algorithm description].
AI with difficulty 'medium' MUST use [moderate algorithm description].
AI with difficulty 'hard' MUST use [advanced algorithm description].

properties.grid: 2D array of cells with fields: mine (bool), revealed (bool), flagged (bool), neighborMineCount (int), exploded (bool)

actions.name: player_move
actions.result: Apply mechanics.move_validation and mechanics.capture; update state; switch to AI; check end conditions

actions.name: ai_move
actions.result: AI calculates move using algorithm; apply mechanics.move_validation and mechanics.capture; update state; switch to human; check end conditions

actions.name: restart
actions.result: Reset all state to initial values

setup.initial_placement: Mines are placed on board at initialization using a fixed RNG seed to ensure deterministic replay; board size 9x9 with 10 mines by default.

replay.determinism_note: All random outputs MUST be logged; identical seed yields identical outcomes

capture.result: Revealed cell updates; if zero adjacent mines, flood-fill reveals nearby cells; flagging toggles flag state

capture_algorithm.name: apply_reveal_or_flag
steps: Reveal: if zero neighboring mines, flood-fill reveal adjacent cells
Flag: toggle mine flag on target cell

scoring.winner_determination: All non-mine cells revealed => human wins; if a mine is detonated => human loses; no draw condition defined unless abrupt stalemate

turn_flow.extra_turn_conditions: end game after two consecutive passes

randomness.notes: Mine placement is deterministic for replay

validity_checks: flagging cannot occur on an already revealed cell
revealing a flagged cell is allowed only after unflagging

validation_algorithm.name: grid_scan
steps: Check cell state is unrevealed for reveal
If action is flag, ensure not already flagged or revealed
Return validity and a preview of resulting board state

acceptance.then: Captured pieces/cards/territory update exactly as defined
acceptance.given: A valid capture exists per game rules

acceptance.then: AI uses simple algorithm, makes valid move within 2s
AI MUST block human's winning move

win.check_logic: Verify that unrevealed non-mine cells count == 0

draw.condition: No legal moves exist and not yet won or lost
draw.check_logic: End-turn when no moves available; declare draw if both players have no legal actions

lose.check_logic: Game ends immediately when a mine is revealed
